Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "There are a number of chatlines available, each with its own specific purpose and topics. The chatlines contain individual history (recall), security profiles and special filters of various types."

"%name% \\"Hello.\\"\\r\\n Send the message \\"Hello.\\" to the chatline. This will be presented in most cases (depending on the chatline) like;\\r\\n HH:MM [(chatline)\|Your name] \\"Hello.\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n%name% \\":waves.\\"\\r\\n Send the action \\":waves\\" to the chatline. This will be presented in most cases (depending on the chatline) like;\\r\\n HH:MM [(chatline)] \\"Your name waves.\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n%name% \\";'s house just blew up.\\"\\r\\n Send the action \\";'s house just blew up.\\" to the chatline. This will be presented in most cases (depending on the chatline) like;\\r\\n HH:MM [(chatline)] \\"Your name's house just blew up.\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n%name% who\\r\\n Display everyone who has the chatline enabled.\\r\\n\\r\\n%name% w\\r\\n Display everyone currently online and has the chatline enabled.\\r\\n\\r\\n%name% \\"on\\"\\r\\n Turn the chatline on.\\r\\n\\r\\n%name% off\\r\\n Turn the chatline off.\\r\\n\\r\\n%name% secure\\r\\n Secure the chatline, effectively tying your current body to your entire account on this chatline. This means regardless which body you are logged in as, the name displayed for your actions will be the same.\\r\\n\\r\\n%name% recall\\r\\n Show the line's chat history.\\r\\n\\r\\n%name% recall \\"5\\"\\r\\n Show the last five entries of the chatline.\\r\\n\\r\\n%name% recall \\"*\\"\\r\\n Show all entries available in the chatline."
